name: DKA - Art direction project 2 - Project Reborn
name_original: DKA - Art direction project 2 - Project Reborn
description:
The assignment

The Art Direction Project, was a collaboration between the Master and Bachelor students at DKA. The goal was for all students to try working as in a team with a formal structure on a 3D project. The students were tasked with setting up and managing a workflow and production pipeline within their team, and students were asked to volunteer for preferred development roles before the project started.  The projects were created in Unity, and the usage of online assets were permitted.

The project

51 years ago, when human civilization was at a point of no return and we were heading towards total self-destruction, huge geometric alien structures appeared from the skies. With them, anomalies in the form of spatial distortions followed, which erased every piece of manmade media. Books, records, posters and so forth where emptied and erased, and every human's mind was wiped. Selected humans were frozen down by the aliens, to emerge in a new world and start anew. These few humans are called REBORNS, and started a new civilization on only their own subconscious, alien-manipulated intuition. You are one of these REBORNS, and on your first venture into this new world you encounter an old house...

Group members

Ashcon Hamedi Nejad - Art director

Milas Ray Manley Norman - Lead designer

Josefine Kronhøj - 3D artist

Isak Ravn - Tech artist and lead programmer

Isaak Lerche - Concept artist and sound artist

Jiayu - Concept
